title: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, June 14, 2013
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, June 14, 2013
description: Voters in Iran go to the polls today to pick a new president -- what does it mean for their economy? The Airbus A350 jumbo jet makes its maiden flight today. It’s Airbus’ answer to rival Boeing’s ill-fated 787 Dreamliner, which broke ground on aerodynamics and fuel efficiency four years ago. And we take a look at the 'Moneyball' economy.
teaser: Voters in Iran go to the polls today to pick a new president -- what does it mean for their economy? The Airbus A350 jumbo jet makes its maiden flight today. It’s Airbus’ answer to rival Boeing’s ill-fated 787 Dreamliner, which broke ground on aerodynamics and fuel efficiency four years ago. And we take a look at the 'Moneyball' economy.
byline: Sabri Ben-Achour, David Weinberg, Mark Garrison, Stacey Vanek Smith, Saeed Barzin, David Brancaccio, Bruce Johnson and Will Oremus
